name: Save Your Bacon (impaledvlad)
description:
A game where you have to protect your prize pig from jealous farmers!

Collect coins to buy Powerups, and use your body to save Piggy Smalls from the rocks thrown by your neighbours. 

Survive as long as possible!

--------------------------

Made By:

 John Manning

 Emanuel Wiens

 Ushashi Orunima

 Daniel Gold

 Liam Berry

--------------------------

 Made in Processing for the UManitoba CSSA Game Jam with the theme "1 HP".
